title: The 3 types of people Allah Smiles At? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] says I know that there 
are three categories of people that   Allah Smiles looking at them can 
you mention the names of them   there is a Hadith and Allah says the Prophet 
(Peace and Blessing Upon Him) says in it Allah   loves three he laughs or Smiles at them 
and he is happy with them one is a fighter   when his battalion runs away from the battlefield   he attacks the enemy alone either he's 
martyred or Allah grants him victory Allah says to the angels look to my servant   how he is fighting for my cause how is he patient 
and tolerant for my cause the second category a   man having a beautiful woman in a comfortable 
bed wakes up in the middle of the night   Allah says he abandons his desire and remembers me 
and if he wishes he would have continued sleeping   so Allah loves this person and he laughs or 
Smiles at him and thirdly a group in travel   so they ride and late at night they go 
to sleep well he stands up in prayer   whether at ease or in hardship these are 
the three types that Allah smiles to or   laughs to and Allah loves as may 
Allah make me and you one of them and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
